settings.title: Settings

collapsed.title: Collapsed
collapsed.description: Collapses the sidenav to show only icons. Expands on hover.

flatMenu.title: Flat Menu
flatMenu.description: Hides submenus and displays all items in a flat list. Parent menu titles are hidden.

expandAll.title: Expand All Submenus
expandAll.description: Keeps all submenus automatically open. Does not work with flat menu.

size.title: Size
size.description: Changes the sidenav size (Small, Medium, Large).

shadow.title: Shadow
shadow.description: Adds or removes shadow from the sidenav.

border.title: Border
border.description: Shows or hides the sidenav border.

fixed.title: Fixed
fixed.description: Fixes the navbar at the top of the screen, stays in place when scrolling.

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.description: Makes the navbar transparent, allowing background content to show through.

size.title: Size
size.description: Changes the navbar size (Small, Medium, Large).

compactMode.title: Compact Mode
compactMode.description: Makes the interface more compact by reducing spacing between elements.

rtlMode.title: RTL Mode
rtlMode.description: Switches the interface to right-to-left (RTL) mode, suitable for Arabic and Hebrew languages.
